name: in.version
description:
[click to focus inside the game's frame to begin]

You're at a party.

You enjoy the people there well enough. Talking to fellow partygoers seems to help the time pass by more quickly, even if the conversation sometimes feels a bit menial and repetitive.

You feel an obligation to stay until the end of the party, and you know that you won't make it without getting away from everyone else so that you can just have a moment to breathe and regain some energy.

That's in.version.
